org.mini2Dx.ui.effect

Class SlideIn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.effect.SlideIn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UiEffect

    public class SlideIn
extends java.lang.Object
implements UiEffect
    A UiEffect that moves a UiElement from off-screen to its target position

      • update

        public boolean update(UiContainerRenderTree uiContainer,
                      CollisionBox currentArea,
                      Rectangle targetArea,
                      float delta)
        Description copied from interface: UiEffect
        Updates the effect
        Specified by:
        update in interface UiEffect
        Parameters:
        uiContainer - The UiContainerRenderTree the UiElement belongs to
        currentArea - The current area that the UiElement is set to render in. Manipulate this to change where the element renders.
        targetArea - The target area that the UiElement is set to render in as specified by the render tree and layout.
        delta - The frame delta
        Returns:
        True if the UiElement should be rendered
